name: Batman: Gotham City Racer
description: Batman: Gotham City Racer is a racing game released in 2001 by Ubisoft for the Sony PlayStation. It is based on The New Batman Adventures and incorporated many clips from the series into the game.There are 51 levels. There are 6 music tracks that the player can choose from while playing the game. All 6 are done by Ray Fabi.
